item.title: Snowflake Vigil: A How-To for Grief and Young Ones
item.description: I mentioned in an earlier post that I may do a “snowflake vigil” with my kiddos, all under age 4, regarding the tragic mass shooting at Pulse, a gay club in Orlando. It’s critical to start an ongoing conversation with them even now about loving others, respecting all, and advocacy.
